alert.note: Alert for Pike (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pike County through 645 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pecks Pond, or 16 miles northeast of Mount Pocono, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pecks Pond and Dingmans Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
